trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is in need of a helping hand.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated locations and defeat any voidsent that appear.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_000<tab>I can't say I understand Alisaie's answer, but a debt is a debt.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>At first I didn't know what to make of Zero, but her frankness speaks to me. I like her!
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>My thanks again for agreeing to help.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>The Ilsabard contingent brings in shipments of food, medicine, and other necessities by airship.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>We have yet to deliver a share of supplies to Tertium, and I would appreciate it if one of you could assist us with the task today.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>Well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It looks like you're with me, then.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>Voidsent sightings have been increasing by the day, which is why I had a mind to go out and patrol the Eblan Rime. Shall we?
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>Voidsent were spotted here not long ago. Considering the proximity to Camp Broken Glass, everyone is understandably concerned.

TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_ALISAIE_000_021<tab>But hopefully not for much longer. You follow this road eastward, and I'll have a look to the north. If you should encounter any voidsent, I won't begrudge you for dispatching them without me.
TEXT_AKTKMJ103_04672_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>You survey your surroundings, but do not spy any errant voidsent...
